IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

returns._0: The total amount available for payout

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH).
params.splits: The percentage splits for each recipient.

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show

params._selloutProtocolWallet: The address of the Sellout Protocol Wallet
params._showContract: The address of the Show contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)
The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._boxOfficeContract: The address of the Box Office contract.

setDAOTreasuryAddress(address).details: This function can only be called by the protocol owner. It updates the address that holds DAO funds.

params._theGarden: The new address for the DAO treasury

params.showId: The unique identifier of the show

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params.paymentToken: The payment token address (address(0) for ETH)

THE_GARDEN().notice: Address of the public DAO, aka the garden

THE_STEWARD().notice: Address of the protocol owner multisig, aka the steward

boxOfficeContract().notice: Address of the Box Office contract that can interact with the vault

calculateTotalPayoutAmount(bytes32,addre.notice: Calculates the total amount available for payout for a show

clearVault(bytes32,address).notice: Clears the vault for a specific show, resetting stored values to zero

depositToVault(bytes32).notice: Deposits ether into the vault for a specified show

depositToVaultERC20(bytes32,uint256,addr.notice: Deposits ERC20 tokens into the vault for a specified show

distributeShares(bytes32,address[],uint2.notice: Distributes the total available payout among participants of a show based on predefined splits. Initially, a "steward" fee (4%) goes to the protocol wallet to support maintenance and growth. A "garden" fee (1%) goes to the DAO treasury, symbolizing seeding for future decentralization. Over time, the intention is to shift all fees towards the "garden", fully sustaining the ecosystem.

getShowPaymentToken(bytes32).notice: Gets the payment token for a specific show

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializes the contract with the Show contract and the Sellout Protocol Wallet

payout(bytes32,address,address).notice: Allows the organizer or artist to withdraw funds after a show has been completed

pendingPayouts(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping to track pending payouts in Ether for each show and wallet address

pendingRefunds(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping from showId to wallet addresses to pending refunds in Ether

pendingTokenPayouts(bytes32,address,addr.notice: Mapping to track pending payouts in ERC20 tokens for each show and wallet address

pendingTokenRefunds(bytes32,address,addr.notice: Mapping from showId and token address to wallet addresses to pending token refunds

processRefund(bytes32,uint256,address,ad.notice: Processes a refund adjustment in the financial records of a show

setContractAddresses(address).notice: Sets the Box Office contract address.

setDAOTreasuryAddress(address).notice: Updates the address of the DAO treasury (the Garden)

setShowPaymentToken(bytes32,address).notice: Sets the payment token for a specific show

showContract().notice: Address of the Show contract that can interact with the vault

showInstance().notice: Interface instance of the IShow contract

showPaymentTokens(bytes32).notice: Mapping to track the payment token for each show

showTokenVault(bytes32,address).notice: Mapping from showId and token address to its accumulated ERC20 token balance

showVault(bytes32).notice: Mapping from showId to its accumulated ether balance

withdrawRefund(bytes32,address,address).notice: Allows a user to withdraw their refund for a specific show
